titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: ESTIMATED DISCHARGE DATE (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) - Description

div.p: ESTIMATED DISCHARGE DATE (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL) is the same as attribute PLANNED ACTIVITY DATE where the PLANNED ACTIVITY DATE TYPE is National Code 'Estimated Discharge Date (Hospital Provider Spell)'.
Note: for the Mental Health Services Data Set, this is different to the PLANNED DISCHARGE DATE (HOSPITAL PROVIDER SPELL), which is set once the PATIENT has been confirmed for discharge.
